alert.note: Alert for Chester; Henderson; Madison; McNairy (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 04 at 6:26PM CDT by NWS Memphis
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Henderson, northwestern McNairy, southeastern Madison and Chester Counties through 700 PM CDT... At 626 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Masseyville, or near Henderson, moving northeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Henderson, Jacks Creek, Masseyville, Mifflin, McNairy, Finger, Enville, Pinson, Beech Bluff, Huron, Russell Crossroads, Hickory Corners, Roby, Five Points, Montezuma, Cabo, Middle Fork, White Fern and Pinson Mounds State Archaeological Park. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
